attributes.action: Allow a Society to protect the Elderly in Care.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Isn't it time that here in the UK we had a society that protects the elderly, children have the NSPCC, birds have RSPB, animals have RSPCA, what do the elderly have? Social services , Age concern, and Saga, hardly the same, so you can't hurt a bird, a cat, or a baby, but you can beat the living daylights out of a pensioner in care, and who cares, they will die soon anyway. Its not right, we might ALL be in this position one day, and then it will be too late. So what is needed is a society NSPSC.National Society Protection Senior Citizens.
